opendial.inference.approximate

Class WeightedSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.datastructs.Assignment
      • opendial.inference.approximate.WeightedSample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<WeightedSample>

    public class WeightedSample
extends Assignment
implements java.lang.Comparable<WeightedSample>
    Representation of a weighted sample, which consists of an assignment of values together with a weight (here in logarithmic form) and utility.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-02-04 09:51:48 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
